resources.string: Have questions about how %1$s works? Noticing some issues connecting?\n\nView our %2$s and apps that are %3$s

string-array.name: hotspot_speed_items
string-array.item: Plug this device into power and make sure it is charging
Enable the "Always Alive" tweak (disable Battery Optimization)
Try changing the Broadcast Frequency between 2.4GHz and 5GHz
Restart this device and your connecting device
Toggle Airplane Mode, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth on and off multiple times on this device

resources.string: Still having slow speeds?\nView the Wiki page for diagnosing %1$s
